subject: Politics
title: The Future of Political Philosophy
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Future of Political Philosophy.

hook.text: AI rights, space governance, gene editing ‚Äî tomorrow's politics will face questions no philosopher has answered yet.

buildup.text: New technologies and global crises are outpacing old political categories. Left vs right may not be enough.

discovery.text: Philosophers now debate digital rights, algorithmic justice, and whether AI systems deserve moral status.

twist.text: The biggest challenge may be institutional. Our democratic systems were designed for the 18th century, not the 21st.

climax.text: Political philosophy isn't a museum piece. It's the workshop where we build tools for problems that don't exist yet.

punchline.text: The future needs new political ideas. Philosophy is where they're born.

quiz.question: What new challenges does political philosophy face?
